name: Titan's Tower
storyline: You’ve recently joined the Teen Titans, but you don’t know anyone! Talk to the ladies of the team, make friends, and maybe you can earn their trust! If jerking off in the friend zone isn’t your fetish, use your psychic powers to control them sexually!
summary: You've recently joined the Teen Titans, but you don't know anyone! Talk to the ladies of the team, make friends, and maybe you can earn their trust! If jerking off in the friend zone isn't your fetish, use your psychic powers to control them sexually!
